title: Add JavaScript unit tests for frontend components
description: Add unit tests for main.js, garden-renderer.js, skill-connections.js, and celebrations.js. Consider using Jest or Vitest. Focus on: archetype calculation logic, skill state transitions, graph rendering edge cases.

title: Add API input validation for query parameters
description: Add explicit validation for API query parameters (e.g., age range 0-60). Currently age params are not explicitly validated. Use Flask request validation or Pydantic for robust input handling.
close_reason: Implemented API input validation with validation.py module. Added age range query params (0-720 months) to skills endpoints and request body validation for POST endpoints.

title: Add Python type hints throughout codebase
description: Add comprehensive type hints to all Python files (app.py, seed_dev_db.py, etc.) for better IDE support, documentation, and error catching. Focus on function signatures, return types, and key data structures.

title: Optimize DOM performance for large skill trees
description: Large DOM with 150+ skills may slow on older devices (noted in test_improvements.md). Consider: virtual scrolling, canvas-based rendering for large graphs, lazy loading of off-screen skills, or requestAnimationFrame optimizations.

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Complete self.md with runtime specifications
description: Complete the self.md agent self-description file with TBD sections including runtime specifications, configuration details, and operational guidelines.

title: Add Infisical secrets management for production
description: Integrate Infisical for secrets management following Gas Town policy. Currently no authentication layer exists. For future multi-user/cloud deployment: configure Machine Identity, store any API keys/secrets in Infisical, update Docker configs to use infisical run.

title: Add OpenAPI/Swagger documentation for API endpoints
description: Create OpenAPI 3.0 specification for all API endpoints: /api/skills, /api/child_progress/<child_id>, /api/skill_progress/<child_id>, /health, /health/live, /health/ready. Include request/response schemas, error codes, and examples.

title: Add PWA/Service Worker for offline capability
description: Add Service Worker for Progressive Web App capability. Enable offline access to skill data and child progress. Useful for parents tracking development without constant internet. Cache skills.xml and static assets.

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Add SSL/TLS termination guide for production deployment
description: Document SSL/TLS termination setup for production. Include: nginx reverse proxy configuration, Let's Encrypt certificate setup, HTTPS redirect configuration. Update DOCKER_SETUP.md with production security guidelines.
close_reason: Added comprehensive SSL/TLS termination guide to DOCKER_SETUP.md including: Nginx reverse proxy configuration with modern TLS settings, Let's Encrypt certificate setup with auto-renewal, HTTPS redirect configuration, production security guidelines (firewall, secrets, headers), monitoring and backup strategies, and deployment checklist.

title: Use Gunicorn instead of Flask dev server for production
description: Replace Flask development server with Gunicorn for production deployment. Update Dockerfile and docker-compose.prod.yml. Add appropriate worker configuration (workers = 2 * CPU + 1). Include proper signal handling for graceful shutdown.
